tool_description: Compiles comprehensive supplier profiles by aggregating data from multiple sources including capabilities, financials, certifications, and market presence.

supplier_ids.description: Array of supplier IDs to build profiles for

include_financial_data.description: Whether to include detailed financial information

include_performance_history.description: Whether to include historical performance data

include_risk_assessment.description: Whether to include risk assessment data

include_market_analysis.description: Whether to include market position analysis

data_freshness_days.description: Maximum age of data to include in days

error_messages: Invalid supplier_ids: At least one valid supplier ID is required, maximum 50 allowed.
Invalid profile_depth: Must be one of [basic, standard, comprehensive].
Invalid data_freshness_days: Must be between 1 and 365 days.
Data compilation failed: Unable to compile complete profiles for some suppliers.
Profile building timeout: Request exceeded processing time limit, try with fewer suppliers.
Insufficient data sources: Some profile components unavailable due to missing data sources.
usage: Provide supplier_ids array to build profiles for. Configure profile_depth and toggle various data inclusion options. Set data_freshness_days to control data recency. Returns comprehensive supplier profiles with aggregated information.

supplier_ids.description: Array of supplier IDs with built profiles

profile_completeness.description: Completeness scores (0-100) for each supplier profile

key_strengths.description: Identified key strengths for each supplier

potential_concerns.description: Potential concerns or weaknesses for each supplier
